casebody.data:
SANDOVAL et al. v. PFEUFFER et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. December 11, 1916.) No. 2879. In error to the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Texas; Henry D. Clayton, Judge. Don A. Bliss, of San Antonio, Tex., for plaintiffs in error. J. D. Guinn, Marcus W. Davis, and Wm. Aubrey, all of San Antonio, Tex., for defendants in error.

Before PARDEE and WALKER, Circuit Judges, and FOSTER, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

On consideration of the transcript, in the light of the oral arguments and briefs, we find no reversible error. The judgment of the District' Court is affirmed.
